summary: This document is a letter from Eric J. Ryan of UBS Financial Services, Inc. to the Federal Bureau of Investigation in response to a Grand Jury Subpoena issued on August 16, 2019, regarding Ghislaine Maxwell. The letter outlines the items UBS is providing to comply with the subpoena and requests confidentiality regarding the documents.

persons.name: Eric J. Ryan
persons.context: Eric J. Ryan is the author of the letter responding to the Grand Jury Subpoena on behalf of UBS Financial Services, Inc.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is referenced in the context of the Grand Jury Subpoena issued to UBS Financial Services, Inc.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued
events.description: A Grand Jury Subpoena was issued to UBS Financial Services, Inc. requesting information related to Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Telephone Call Regarding Subpoena
events.description: A telephone call took place on this date to discuss the compliance with the Grand Jury Subpoena.

locations: 1285 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY 10019
keyFacts: The letter is a response to a Grand Jury Subpoena issued to UBS Financial Services, Inc. regarding Ghislaine Maxwell.
UBS is providing account opening documents, account statements, and other requested documentation to comply with the subpoena.
Eric J. Ryan is the paralegal representing UBS in this matter.
The letter requests confidentiality for the documents provided and advance notice of any disclosure.
